**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 23 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18 [Xulgath Mage](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2019) **Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 27 **Perception** +12; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +15, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +12, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +15, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +17, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +9, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +12 **Str** +1 **Dex** +2 **Con** +1 **Int** +0 **Wis** +1 **Cha** +5 **Items** _+1 [light mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=5)_ --- **AC** 23 **Fort** +12 **Ref** +13 **Will** +14 **HP** 115 **Stench** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246)) 30 feet. A creature entering the aura must attempt a DC 25 Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), and on a critical failure, the creature also takes a –5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. While within the aura, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saves to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune to all [xulgath's](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=102) stench for 1 minute.
**Counterspell **Trigger** A creature Casts a Spell the xulgath mage has in her repertoire** **Effect** The xulgath mage expends one of her spell slots to counter the triggering creature's casting of the spell in her repertoire. The xulgath mage loses the spell slot as if she had cast the triggering spell and attempts to counteract the
triggering spell. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _light mace_ +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)), **Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning **Melee** jaws +14, **Damage** 1d8+2 piercing **Melee** claw +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 2d6+2 slashing **Arcane Spontaneous Spells** DC 26, spell attack +18 - **Cantrips (4th)** [Acid Splash](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280) - **1st** [Burning Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=30), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) (4 slots) - **2nd** [Create Food](/Spells.aspx?ID=52), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Flaming Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=121), [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271) (4 slots) - **3rd** [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180) (4 slots) - **4th** [Acid Arrow](/Spells.aspx?ID=2), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172) (3 slots) **Bloodline Spells 3 Focus Points,** DC 26 - **4th** [Ancestral Memories](/Spells.aspx?ID=493), [Extend Spell](/Spells.aspx?ID=507)
